args.code:
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
import io
import base64

df = pd.read_csv('sample-weather.csv')

df['date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['date'])

average_temp_c = df['temp_c'].mean()
max_precip_date = df.loc[df['precipitation_mm'].idxmax(), 'date'].strftime('%Y-%m-%d')
min_temp_c = df['temp_c'].min()
temp_precip_correlation = df['temp_c'].corr(df['precipitation_mm'])
average_precip_mm = df['precipitation_mm'].mean()

plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
plt.plot(df['date'], df['temp_c'], color='red')
plt.title('Temperature Over Time')
plt.xlabel('Date')
plt.ylabel('Temperature (C)')
plt.grid(True)
temp_line_chart_buffer = io.BytesIO()
plt.savefig(temp_line_chart_buffer, format='png')
temp_line_chart_buffer.seek(0)
temp_line_chart = base64.b64encode(temp_line_chart_buffer.read()).decode('utf-8')
plt.close()

plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
plt.hist(df['precipitation_mm'], bins=10, color='orange')
plt.title('Precipitation Histogram')
plt.xlabel('Precipitation (mm)')
plt.ylabel('Frequency')
plt.grid(True)
precip_histogram_buffer = io.BytesIO()
plt.savefig(precip_histogram_buffer, format='png')
precip_histogram_buffer.seek(0)
precip_histogram = base64.b64encode(precip_histogram_buffer.read()).decode('utf-8')
plt.close()

final_answer = {
    'average_temp_c': average_temp_c,
    'max_precip_date': max_precip_date,
    'min_temp_c': min_temp_c,
    'temp_precip_correlation': temp_precip_correlation,
    'average_precip_mm': average_precip_mm,
    'temp_line_chart': f'data:image/png;base64,{temp_line_chart}',
    'precip_histogram': f'data:image/png;base64,{precip_histogram}'
}
